poemContent: 12 Gauge shotgun, pulled up, death crows. Across his door is a beastly sight Something dangerous, something with a short height, Vegan badge and blue hair. What, Why, Who? When, How, Where? "Exonmobil is my friend" calls the farmer "Liberals are Republicans" What? BANG BANG BANG3 BULLETS OF IDIOCITY Fired from the farmer's gun. Dead man in front of him. Spilt soymilk, his flat white vegan soy tall latte sorta inside out. And it's over, but not really. 3 flying seagulls fly above, 3 of a kind, all letting fly. PLOP, PLOP, PLOP, Choked by excrament the farmer Gurgles. Liberal Birds. The beer and redpills won't flush it out. The farmer regrets his choice, but not really, The beer and redpills do flush it out. The farmer burps. He puts on his boots and jumps into a Tractor. "Time to farm some lives" Cackling, the creature's skin turned stone, almost As stone as a rock. The END. (except not really) 
